text: Kaya tumhi tyala nahi pahile, jyane rajya-satta prapta karuna ibrahimasi, tyacya palanakartyababata bhandana kele. Jevha ibrahima mhanale ki, majha raba (palanakarta) tara to ahe jo jivanta karato ani marato. To mhanu lagala, midekhila jivanta karato ani marato. Ibrahima mhanale, allaha tara suryala purva disekaduna ugavato tu tyala pascimekaduna ugava. Ata matra to kaphira niruttara ani thakka jhala ani allaha atyacari lokanna sanmarga dakhavita nahi
